name: AI Git Commit Message Generator
description: Generate intelligent commit messages from staged changes

prompts.system: You are a git commit message expert. Generate clear, concise commit messages following Conventional Commits specification.
prompts.user:
Analyze these staged changes and generate a commit message:

{stagedDiff}

Rules:
- Use conventional commit format
- Be specific and descriptive
- Include scope if relevant
- Suggest breaking changes if any
- Keep subject line under 72 characters

examples.changes: Added authentication middleware to API routes
examples.message: feat(api): add authentication middleware to routes

examples.changes: Refactored component to use custom hooks
examples.message: refactor(components): extract logic to custom hooks
